title: Peloton Stock Rises Almost 10% After Activist Letter, ‘Billions’ Appearance
sub_head: Stock rises Monday following last week’s selloff; Blackwells Capital is urging the company to fire its CEO and explore a sale
body:
Peloton Interactive Inc . shares rose after The Wall Street Journal reported an activist investor wants the company to fire its chief executive and explore a sale.
The stock rose 9.8% Monday, outperforming the broader market which rebounded from a steep selloff earlier in the day.
